#summary Frequently asked questions
#labels Featured

  * *App runs but no components are shown in the toolbar. What should I do?*<br><br>Go to the main app folder where *diylc.jar* is and make sure that *library* directory exists and that it contains *main.jar* at the minimum. If that's ok, make sure that the application is running with the current directory set to the main app directory (*diylc3* typically).
